name: UChicago Alumni in Blockchain Panel
description: Register for our first panelist event! Come learn about four UChicago Alumni from ranging classes and how they have thrived in the blockchain space.

name: UChicago Decentralized #1: Mitch Mechigian
description: Mitch Mechigian is the Chief of Staff at Blockchain Coinvestors & Fifth Era.
extraDescription: UChicago Decentralized is a interview-style speaker series intended to be distributed in live stream format and as an audio podcast.

name: Info Session #1
description: Come learn more about our organization, applications, and what we have planned for spring quarter! (all registrants will receive a recording)

name: Info Session #2
description: Come learn more about our organization, applications, and what we have planned for spring quarter! (all registrants will receive a recording)

name: Application Office Hours
description: Come in to ask any last minute questions about your application!
